channel.title: Need help :(
channel.description:
hi people
im the owner of dutch-scape last night my coder scuwed me over .. he fkedup my server pc stole and deleted my server files, deleted all backups and more..
i have his ip and skype name can someone help me plz i worked hard to me my server become someting now its gone ... i have a lame backup from 2 month's ago running now but it misses like 100 updates .. me and my staff made ..
plz someone help me like hack him and get my files back or someting else ... pm me if u want to help me

item.title: Need help :(
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

That’s life. No matter how much you complain about it on here nothing will happen, so I suggest you sort out your attitude and learn who to trust. Regardless, we don’t condone malicious activities against members here at Mopar.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help :(
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

I just wanna get my 2 cents in here before this idiot gets banned.

  1. You run a so called Private Server, but you don’t program it yourself/don’t care enough to keep decent backups. You deserve to be screwed over.
  2. Your grammar skills are of a 8 year old and so I take it you are of that age, so what the fuck are you doing tangled up in all of this shit?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help :(
item.dc:creator: @ianneder ianneder
item.description:
@ianneder wrote:

do you think i care about being banned?

dude lol?
you people dont know what its like to spent so mutch time in a source and than people just steel it from u like that …

i just wanned to host good free gaming serves for people … noting more and people just fk me …

Read full topic

item.title: Need help :(
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Doesn’t matter. You can get banned for just saying you’re going to hack someone. (And learn to spell)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help :(
item.dc:creator: @ianneder ianneder
item.description:
@ianneder wrote:

you dont understand …

i host rs ps for 5-6 years now
i dont trust people that easly i have expirince
2-3 years before i hosted runnyworld had 50+ players
the same thing happend but than with a coder i trusted for 2 years …

so …
u just tell me to trust no one never ever in my life … that not poseble

Read full topic

item.title: Need help :(
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Thats your fault for trusting him.

Always save backups on flash drives.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help :(
item.dc:creator: @ianneder ianneder
item.description:
@ianneder wrote:

i know that but dude i worked 7 month on my server …
like minimal everyday 2 hour most day 5 hours everyday …
and thise dude sais he s good coder ect so he code some tings than after 2 weeks he scruws me over bigg time …
just stole my files delete backups everyting fkedup me pc …

i just need some help …

Read full topic
